name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking.  People with appointments could not get in!  She was by herself. I get that you have to eat, but as nurse I haven’t received a lunch break many times! You eat quickly and keep moving! The lab closed at 3:30!

name: Austin Hart (SmartFishing)
text: Appointment at 9, got there 8:45. It’s after 10 and still haven’t been seen. People lined up in the hallway. Understaffed and unprofessional. Get with it Labcorp. People have other things to do than wait until it’s convenient for you to do your jobs. Update: Waited 4 hours and was never seen!

name: Brandy Taylor
text: Worst lab experience ever. I am shocked that this place is still in business. Very unprofessional staff.  First clue should have been what lab runs out of collection tubes needed for common laboratory testing?!?! Do yourself a favor and go to another laboratory.

name: Sean
text: I had as lovely of an experience as you can expect from a blood draw.  Tons of CORONA safety measures in place and each staff I interacted with was extremely pleasant.  Labcorp was efficient and painless (always a nice bonus)

name: Josiah Radcliffe
text: Hours of operation show they are open til 3pm but when you arrive there is a paper sign on the door that says they are closed from 12-1pm for lunch. So frustrating after making the 45 minute drive and arriving at 12:10pm!

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: This is the worst place I've ever tried to contact. I took my 1 year old to get his labs done (he has epilepsy and other disabilities so this is crucial for dosage regulation). They did great with handling how rough everything went to getting his blood. But a week later the office in Harvest, AL called me after hours and didn't have a message. I tried calling back immediately but they didn't answer. Days later, I contact his doctor and they never faxed over his results. The doctor office and I have both been trying to call the office for days and they won't answer the phone. I even called right when they opened several times today and nothing. This is absurd. You should never ignore the phone if you have the ability to answer and I STILL need the results. I will never recommend this office or any LabCorp to any friends or family members.

name: Stacey
text: Make an appointment on line and  they have highly skilled phlebotomists.  Never had a problem and Naomi ROCKS!  Thank you!

name: Philip Hahn
text: I get it, no one likes having their arm stabbed, but I have never had problems with this location. Wait times seem reasonable, checkin is streamlined, and it's convenient to where I live. Staff are nice and do good work.

name: Annette Charles
text: This place sucks. Very short staffed. Extremely slow. Patient care is none.... Do  not recommend this place. My Doctor suggested another office. Should have went to the other one... I have no clue what they are doing.

name: Linda Shawley
text: They are always friendly and helpful

name: Emily Ford
text: Great people. Was in and out in probably 15 minutes for a urine test. Very nice ladies there

name: Levi Griffin
text:
I went in for blood work, and the staff I encountered were friendly and professional. I did not have an appointment, but they were able to see me right away.

Drawing blood from me can be difficult, but the nurse was able to do it quickly with minimal discomfort on my part.

I have read the negative reviews of this establishment and can say that I did not encounter any of the problems they reported. It seems the issues with unfriendly staff have been corrected.

If I need any further blood work done, then I won't hesitate to return here for it.

name: James Shipma
text: Terrible customer service. Tried to access my results online: had to make an account, OK I can do that. After creating my account, I was told that my information was incorrect. It was not. After THAT I re-entered the correct information and then the system said the information couldn't be validated and I had 30 days to resolve my account (?)... I called my local location and I got a machine telling me the address and office hours, and if I needed help getting my results online, to go to the login portal where all this mess started. I need these results to begin my job and it's taken far too long. Very disappointed.

name: apps apps
text: Service is terrible here. If you have a choice go to HH lab

name: Lily Jaiswal
text: Very slow. Not open for lunch

name: Bob Birmingham
text: Used them many times. Never had a problem getting blood drawn.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: What a useless business. How are you going to schedule someone during your lunch break and make them sit and wait for an hour, cause everyone leaves. Why isn't there an option for 0 stars?

name: Sharon Webber
text: My experience at this office for a simple drug test was horrendous.  The woman working there, Donna Bourdeau, was extremely unprofessional, uncaring, and rude to my children and me.  She refused to allow my daughters to sit in the lobby while I was in the restroom (a total of about 3 minutes for the entire drug test including paperwork), though there was no one else even in the office.  She was aggressive, curt, and downright mean.  Do NOT go to this office if you have children or prefer not to deal with a woman such as this.

name: Google User
text: Will never use this LabCorp again. Doctor ordered some extensive tests. Had to go by the lab to pick up supplies and collection instructions.  Not only did the woman at the front mess up one of my tests, but she offered very unprofessional and unsolicited opinions about my testing. Have written a formal complaint letter, but after reading all the negative reviews about LabCorp, I doubt anyone in the company will give a hoot. This woman at the Jeff Rd location needs to leave the medical field immediately, and flip burgers for a living.  She is completely inept, unprofessional, and unable to maintain an acceptable level of discretion and maturity required for this job.  I will never step foot in this location again even though my Dr's office is directly across the hall. Thankfully, I took my tests to HH labs where they caught the fact that LabCorp messed up one of the tests. Will only go to HH for any future tests.

name: James Stubblefield
text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: This place isn’t staffed adequately enough for the volume they receive. Appointments are merely suggestions. I was seen >30 min after my scheduled appointment time. Staff was very apologetic.

name: Franceska Wackmann
text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

name: Todd A.
text: Easy to deal with. Very professional.

name: Brittany Brashaw
text: The staff are nice but this place is SO slow. Even when you have an appt they take awhile.

resp.text: Hi Brittany- We apologize if we have not met your expectations and thank you for bringing this to our attention.

name: Brandee Laughlin
text: Drove 45 minutes to do a drug screen and as of April they (the office)changed there hours of doing them until 2pm instead of 3:30 which is what the website says and drug screen order.  No help from employees and very inconsiderate.  I along with the other 10 that use this location for our drugs will not be back. We will use Labcorp.

resp.text: We apologize for any disappointment this may have caused, Brandee, and thank you for taking the time to share this feedback with us. Your review will be forwarded to our leadership team to address with our staff. We've verified that the details for this location, including the correct hours of operation for drug screenings, are available on our website at https://appointment.questdiagnostics.com/patient/confirmation. Please contact our Patient Advocacy team with additional details so we can address any concerns directly: 610-454-6075 or patientadvocacy@questdiagnostics.com.

name: Mila speed
text: Great customer service. The employees are nice and very professional. Especially Victoria I was so nervous but she very comforting. Very clean as well.

name: Kalli Webb
text: Went here a while ago for a routine drug screen for my job at the time. I had never taken a drug screen before and the lab tech was super rude. She was rude at the desk and because they didn't ask me prior if I was on medication I almost lost my job! Don't go here!

name: Katie Clearman
text: Very quick, efficient, and professional. Get here before 3:30 if you’re getting a drug test, that’s the cut off time

name: Kenneshia Davis
text: Victoria is wonderful! Great customer service, fast, and friendly!

name: Karey Hughey
text: Victoria is extremely rude!!! We were there for our wellness screening for our insurance and she was very very rude to both of us the entire time.

name: Morgie
text: Haven’t used their services, but one of their couriers came inches from hitting me while cutting me off in traffic. I think the car number was 33440

name: Kimberly Rossler
text: Nobody is at the front desk ever !! The first visit they lost my orders so I was prepared to bring my orders in this visit . Horrible… I even made an appointment but yet have been sitting here for an hour. This location is just sad, always has been but my doctor called orders into this location.

name: Joy Glenn
text:
First of all when you enter the office, absolutely NO instructions or a human being to instruct patients to use the kiosk to sign in. We waited FOR OVER ONE HOUR to get lab drawn. Every one that came in went back while we waited and waited. FINALLY  we were called back by the ABSOLUTE RUDEST human being on this earth!  My daughter which is very sick and afraid wanted me to accompany her....the lab tech asked her if she really needed me, from then on her attitude was worse and worse.  After my daughter told her she was a hard stick due to little veins, boy, she took that to heart. Another tech came in and we finally left.
Yesterday, we received a call that there wasn't enough blood so we were told to go ahead and go down there they will be waiting. MIND YOU we were under the assumption they closed at 5 p.m. due to what we were told the last time we were there. we arrived at 3:55 p.m. we went in and the SAME rude lab tech which NEVER told us at that time they were closing. EVERYTHING we TRIED to ask she cut us off in the most condescending tone and was ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!
.

name: Charlene Smith
text: Aisha Gilmore was my technician today. She was absolutely fabulous! Not only was she friendly and professional, she was so gentle that I never felt the needle. I didn't even realize we were done. Thank you, Aisha, for making this a quick and easy experience.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Angela provided top notch customer service. I appreciate it!

name: Scott Knowles
text: Went this morning & had the best experience you could have when takin' a drug test. Very friendly staff who did a great job getting me in & out quick as possible!! Very satisfied!!!

name: Nolan Crowe
text: I had to get blood work done today, the lady who helped me,  her name is Angela. Quick and friendly.  Didn't feel when she drew the blood.  Recommend this place.

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I choose the location on Montlimar because of the EXCELLENT service provided by the ladies at this location. They try their best to give you a Great experience. Aisha is very cordial, helpful and makes sure my orders are processed correctly. Angela is virtually as painless as it gets for a very sensitive me. She takes the fear out of getting lab work done. 😀Her kindness flows as well.

name: mickey swaboda
text: They hang up on you multiple times if you try making a appointment

name: Summer Davis
text: Went in to do a drug test today. I waked in and was immediately told to check in at the kiosk. Once I went back to do the test the directions the woman gave me were said very quickly and were mumbled. I thought I heard 30, so I assumed I needed to fill the cup up to the 30 line. I came back and she asked me (with an attitude) if I knew I was supposed to be doing a drug test today and did I not have to use the restroom. I told her I thought it was enough and She told me with an attitude again that it was supposed to be up to the 45 line. The only reason I’m giving two stars is after I told her that she rushed through the directions she SORT OF apologized and said she does it so much a day she goes quickly. I understand she does this all day, but you’re dealing with people. Some of these people have never done a drug test before or it has been a fairly long time. It needs to be done with less of an attitude. I shouldn’t walk out feeling stupid or like I was taking up her time when she’s paid to do this.

name: Laura Christian
text: Aisha was great and got us in quickly and made the experience painless even with our two kids in tow.

name: Perry Reed
text: This was an amazing place. Got there right when they opened and was literally out in 10 mins. The young lady who helped me was sweet and very good at what she does. Wished I could remember her name but either way amazing job. It's people like you that make things like this easier to deal with.

name: Todd Phillips
text:
The ladies at this office were Wonderful!! Aisha was very nice and had a Great personality!!  I was their less than 45 minutes. I hope they can get more help so they can answering alot faster.
RTR!!!!

name: ROBBIE SEAMAN
text: Get skipped and wait for hours

name: Gene Parnell
text: Sloooowwwwww

name: Alan Hinkel
text: I didn’t hear, hey how are you. I heard “ You have to check into the kiosk first “ Okay. I went to the counter and said how long will it be. I heard “ Well, there is one, two, three, four people ahead of you. “ I can count. I don’t know how long it takes for each patient. So, before I even go back, they’re getting 1 Star. They shouldn’t get that.

name: Jasmine Terry
text: In and out very fast. Friendly professional staff.

name: Casey Welborn
text: Rushed, but thorough and accurate. Just wish they didn't rush people so much.

name: Cryo Xeen
text: Told me the bill would be $100, sent me a bill for $300.

name: Kellie Terry
text: This facility is amazing, super clean with large changing rooms. There are windows in the MRI room so you can see daylight.  The machine isn't too tight.  Even larger people can fit comfortably.  The staff is super sweet and easy to work with.  They do everything they can to schedule your MRI for a day and time that is convenient for you.

resp.text: Thank you, Kellie!

name: Alyssa H
text: I had a great experience with my first MRI.  The staff were all friendly and glad to answer all my questions.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Alyssa!  We appreciate you and your support.

name: Rebekka Sharpe
text: Friendly staff, comfortable environment, but SCAMMY! I paid a large copay about three weeks ago to get an MRI and still know nothing. They "sent it off to Birmingham" to be read where the results would then be sent to my doctor, but my doctor has heard nothing. First of all if you have a state of the art MRI facility in Decatur Alabama why can you not have someone in Decatur Alabama read the results? Secondly if the results cannot be read at the facility then why Birmingham? There are plenty of places in the area that have someone in house to read your MRI, or at least get the results back to you in a day or three.

resp.text: Good Morning, Rebekka Sharpe.  The results of your MRI were sent to your referring physician on 11/15/17 in under 24 hours. We have the fax confirmation on file of when and where it was sent.  Your referring physician is whom you need to speak with about those results. If you are having trouble still, please call us at 256-350-7779.  Just let us know! We will be happy to send the results again to your referring physician if they need us to. We partner with a group of Radiologists to read our scans out of Birmingham. This helps to provide accurate reads in a timely manner (24 hour results). I hope this information helps.  Have a great day and we wish you a Happy New Year.

name: Phillip Hand
text: Best staff around! Easy to work with and always make sure to give you the best experience possible. Definitely a 5 star organization!!!

name: Renee Knight
text: Friendly staff with same day scheduling. Very comfortable place to have an MRI. Especially if you are claustrophobic.  It is open on all 4 sides which made it much easier for me to relax and complete the MRI.

name: Susan Williams
text: Absolutely wonderful experience the staff is very friendly and willing to work with you in any way. I suffered from back pain for years and the last alternative was an MRI but I was claustrophobic but they were patient with me and worked with me to help me be able to get one, the openness of the machine was soo much better the problem was found I had back surgery 2 months ago and now NO PAIN! Thank you to Heath Alford and his stafff I would recommend them to anyone in my situation 😊

name: Bobby Holladay
text: Open MRI's staff was unbelievably nice and courteous. I was in and out with a very short wait time.  Facility was immaculate.

name: Whitley Alford
text: Friendly staff with a clean facility and welcoming atmosphere.  Great place to go if you are claustrophobic. Results back within 24 hours.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Whitley.

name: Leigh Corfman
text: I regularly have lab work done here. The staff is always professional and good to work with. I would suggest them to anyone looking for a lab to use in Gadsden, AL. Thanks!

name: Jason Welsh
text: Got blood work done, only got stuck once. They also will give you a text when they are ready for you so you don’t have to wait in the lobby.

name: Keith Landers
text: Very unprofessional.  Web site to check your labs does not work correctly and the lab work was not posted 3 weeks later and noone could tell me where it was.  I will have to have the lab work done again at another facility.  Will never use this one again.

name: Roy Reynolds
text: Came in for a pre-employment drug screen, a simple urine test that LITERALLY takes minutes. Waited almost an hour.... 💩 NEVER WILL GO BACK TO THIS LOCATION. HORRIBLE

name: stephanie self
text: Quickly got my lab work done.

name: Sherry Rylander
text: Unprofessional staff. Intimidated my Mother into paying a bill from 2015 that had already been paid.

name: Jesse Boldt
text: Rude

name: Khalil Caldwell
text:
I went here a urine screen and was initially treated great by a young man that took my sample and acted professionally.
Unfortunately upon calling a week or so later was greeted by a very unhappy, frankly rude female receptionist. I asked if there was a result for my test and she then mocked me saying, “If didn’t pay for the screen then they own my urine” (laughing in condescending tone).
I understand that these offices have no incentive to treat their patients with respect because companies usually pay for their services; however, it was unusual to be treated disrespectfully out of the blue by a stranger that was probably having a bad day.
Good luck if you are an employee having to deal with this company. 👎🏽👎🏽

name: Linda Kicker
text: Staff person did a great job. It was painless. I was taken on time. Clean office.

name: Michelle Downs
text: They were very professional, friendly and timely.

name: Ebony Peak
text: I went to this facility to have labs done. I was sent here by my doctor. The company charged me a fee that wasn’t supposed to be charged, did not complete all my labs, did not even have all the labs that were requested by my doctor. My doctor then reached out to them advising me that they were not supposed to charge me anything. Was advised that they were to be issuing me a refund to call them to go pick it up and was treated horribly as if I had done something wrong. The lady who answered the phone had a nasty attitude and talked sassy to me. I don’t recommend this facility nor would I ever visit here again.

name: Stacia Gaines
text: I really appreciated the courteous and accommodating staff person who worked me in.  Their process was streamlined and felt safe.  The test was not painful, and they called me with results within 2 hours.  They did seem to be short-staffed, but the folks that were there worked hard to keep things running smoothly.

name: Kendra Chambers
text: I went to ARCpoint for a COVID test last Friday and the process was seamless! The receptionist, Amy was SO friendly on the phone when I booked my appointment. When I came in, I waited for just a few minutes and quickly got tested. Kim, who administered my test has an excellent bedside manner and was also very kind! I received my results the same day within an hour. This was truly a wonderful and stress free experience!

name: Earl Pecor
text: They knew i was there for a hair drug test for my job and seen i had short hair but didnt say anything till i waited a hour to get called back.

name: Sarah Edmonds
text: Scheduling was quick and easy. I called in the late afternoon and was able to make an appointment for the next morning. At the time of my appointment, was very easy and fast in and out.

name: Sherry Harris
text: I highly recommend ARCpoint Labs of Birmingham.  They are quick, efficient, and welcoming.  They stagger their appointments so you are not sitting in a waiting room full of people waiting to get a Covid-19 test.  They also give you all the information to file your insurance for the fee.  Best of all, results by the end of the day!  I was so impressed that I shared their contact information with the entire staff where I work.

name: Victoria Ebrahimi Charles
text: Unfortunately I’ve had multiple covid tests. Brian makes the test almost painless and is very personable. Every person on the staff is helpful and goes out of their way to make the experience as easy as possible. Great facility!

name: Maria Schaffer
text: Easy to make an  appointment.  They get you in and out fast.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Great experience.

name: Don Blackall
text: Awesome people. Quick and easy. In and out testing. Quick results.

name: Kristen Dixon
text: I was very pleased with ArcPoint! I was in and out and the staff was amazing!

name: Sergio Hernandez
text: Worst place ever!!!  Brian the guy with earrings and completely rude will send you back telling you a lot of BS if you get there 30mins before closing, their sign and website says that they do ”take walks in” but it’s a totally lie, they sent me away twice (second time I was there 1hr and 20 mins before closing)... Pretty much you can tell this guys just wanna go home and don’t care about their costumers...

name: Forsyth White
text: Very easy and quick test - and results emailed quickly!

name: Michael Hill
text: Very courteous and professional. We were in and out in just a few minutes and the results of the test was emailed to us before the end of the day.

name: Nancy Harris
text: The staff was professional and efficient!  It couldn’t have gone any better.  Appointment at 10:00 and I was told results would be available by 430. I had an email with my results within two hours.

name: Rebekah Wales
text: The fastest appointment I have ever been too. I was tested for COVID here twice. I was not in the facility for more than 10 minutes from the time I walked in to the time I walked out. Everyone was very friendly and I had no issues. Would definitely recommend.

name: Andrea Thames
text: Everyone in the office is always so nice!  Love how quick they are!

name: Chelsea Johnson
text: Went there for Covid testing. It was clean and felt safe. I was in and out quickly. The staff was friendly and professional. I got my results within an hour. I highly recommend this testing facility!

name: Shiraz Merchant
text: Great experience - Prompt, professional, courteous and timely results.  Makes no sense to try and save a few dollars and deal with the zoo's at the doc in the boxes when you can come to ARCpoint Labs.  You get what you pay for!

name: Luis & Megan Devoto
text: Front desk receptionist was new but friendly. Male nurse who gave my 4 year old the Covid test was friendly. I'm not certain he went far enough up her nose for the test, but I'm not a nurse so I trust the process.

name: Tara Lang
text: Went in for a antigens test. They tried to talk us out of it to do another test that cost 2x more and refused to put through insurance!  They even crossed out the Test the Dr ordered on the official order and put the test they wanted to run on it.  Very unprofessional.  We walked out and went to Labcorp.

name: Will Grimmett
text: Friendly Staff, Quick and Easy. Got in and out of the office fast

name: Vicki Yarbrough
text: Easy in and out. Courteous staff.

name: Mark Zakutney
text: I appreciate how accommodating ARC was on short notice.  Friendly folks and extremely helpful.

name: Cherry Moody
text: Had a great experience at ARC point labs!  They took great care of my family!

name: Daniel Topping
text: Fast friendly efficient service provided for a COVID test. Thank you so much.

name: Deidre Lesley
text: Staff very friendly and professional. No long wait times. I would definitely use them again.

name: Bobby Reuse
text: Short wait, super nice people. In/out quick. Highly recommend.

name: Jacob Pearce
text: Had a problem with a drug test done. Management went above and beyond to take care of me after the initial issue.

name: Deborah Grant
text: Great experience- friendly staff was very responsive to my needs! A very well run office!

name: Thad Mickler
text: Friendly and outgoing staff. Speedy results. Very positive experience.

name: Amanda Franklin
text: They were easy to get an appointment with, quickly got us back when we arrived, and got our results back same day. Would definitely recommend them and use them again.

name: Tracie Stricklin
text: Quick service...I was in and out in around 10 minutes. Professional and friendly staff.

name: Wendy Hartley-Gregerson
text: Fast in and out. Staff very friendly.

name: Bama Grad
text: They went above and beyond to get us quick results for our trip.  Thank you do much

name: Louis Dina
text: Courteous, efficient, Safe, wearing masks and scheduled our appointment to maintain social distancing, reasonable prices. Mailed our samples off and they arrived at the laboratory right on schedule.

name: Doug Preston
text: Excellent service and staff

name: Harrison Brannon
text:
Timely friendly professional
Testing with results expedited to our cellphones

name: Jason Hogan
text: Quick, reliable screening services!

name: Lindsay Walker
text: A little expensive, but great service and timely results.

name: Stephen Anderson
text: Professional, fast, friendly and efficient.

name: Barry Thomas
text: Fast simple and very helpful staff.

name: David Fowler
text: Fast, friendly and great communication, highly recommended !!!

name: Josh Hillman
text: They were very professional and quick.

name: Gabriel Velez
text: Very nice and on point I was in and out in no time very professional.

name: D Thorn
text: Highly recommended. An extremely high standard of professionalism.

name: Denesha Cuneo
text: Very professional. Didn’t skip a beat to provide education and make me feel comfortable.

name: David Tosch
text: Very professional and quick.

name: Sherri Dunn
text: I took my son here for lab work. We were in and out quickly! Great customer service. I highly recommend!

name: Holly Adams
text: Fast and great service!

name: Vincent Dichiara
text: Very willing to accommodate.

name: Andrew Jernigan
text: Great team, amazing service and even better pricing. Highly recommend.

name: altaf virani
text: good and fast service

name: Lula Taylor
text: There are the best in and out

name: Andreanna Davis
text: They are absolutely wonderful! I took in my Dad’s 1993 Ford Lightning. We had been having trouble with it going dead and just not running right. Several other local mechanics had tried to fix it with little success. I read about Hesco and decided to give them a try. I’m so glad I did. They got Dad’s truck running perfectly! I will never let anyone else work on it again. They do a great job and great work! I just can’t thank them enough for all they did. Would recommend them highly to anyone.

name: Rick Clark
text: I bought a lotus and it was delivered with a flat tire.  Jeff came out to my house picked up the tire and brought it back the next day to put the tire on and check the pressure in the rest of the tires. He was happy to answer any question I had!  Amazing customer service!  A+!  I will be using them for the service of my car.

name: jeffrey vaughn
text: I grew up next door to Jeff. I remember a day when I looked out and saw a 2nd gen camaro with a blower sitting a foot out of the hood. It was Jeff. I was a kid and did the burnout hand signal..to which he happily obliged. Worked with his lil sis many years later and he still remembered. Genuinely thoughtful and kind dude who exudes knowledge.

name: Bailey Ike
text: The customer service is outstanding, the people working there feel authentic and give the impression they truly care.

name: Radioman
text:
Jeff @ HESCO is unparalleled in his infinite wisdom behind the wheel and under the hood of a car. He has been known to pull a rabbit out of a hat on many occasions. I would not hesitate to take any of my vehicles to him for any reason.
Thanks, Jeff-
Tim @ Rickwood Radio Service

name: Eric Morin
text: At last found a shop to work on my Mazda RX-8 R3 with a twin rotary. Honest diagnosis and job well done. Think it runs better than when I bought it! Thank you Jeff and crew!

resp.text: Thank you for the outstanding feedback, Eric! We are so glad that you were able to find a shop that fit your auto needs, we look forward to working with you and your RX-8 again!

name: Charles B Ireland
text: I have been taking my machine work to Hesco for many years. Best machine shop anywhere. Now that I no longer work on my own vehicles, I intend to entrust them with their care.

resp.text: Charles, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It is a pleasure to work see you in our machine shop. We are so glad we have gained your long term trust! Let us know if there is anything we can assist you with!

name: Nichole Posten
text: As someone indicated, they do a lot of specialty high end vehicle work but it has been well worth the extra to know that the work is done right.  I have been taking my now 10yr old (beater) Jeep here for 8+ years and will take my new Subaru here.  Joe is great and always has the time to spend explaining anything to you.  He even took my husband and son around the shops to look at all of the cars there.

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty over the years Nichole, we truly appreciate it!

name: Stephen Wilson
text: These guys do some of the best work in Birmingham. That being said, when you see the Ferraris and classic cars in the parking lot you know you are going to pay a price that matches their level of quality work. Don't let the abrasive or lack of communication keep you from at least getting a written quote from their shop. On a side note, get someone to show you around their facility because it is basically an ever changing museum of mechanical genius. Custom builds, daily drivers, etc it's a pretty cool spot in the heart of downtown. If all else fails, you can walk to Good People Brewery or Regions Park  and drink away your sorrows.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review, Stephen! We appreciate getting your feedback and we hope next time we can deliver a 5-star experience!

name: Lindsay Hobbs
text:
I have nothing but good things to say about Hesco and the people working there! My husband and I were driving from Utah to Atlanta when our car broke down in Birmingham. Even though they were busy, they fit us in and got us back on the road the next day! Not only did they fix our car, but they went above and beyond to make sure that we were taken care of while we were stuck in the city. They even called us a few days later to make sure we had made it to our destination safely and without any problems!
We are SO grateful for Jeff, Joe, and everyone else who took such good care of us! This was by far the best experience we have ever had with a mechanic, and would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review, Lindsay! We are glad you arrived safely, and we can't thank you enough for all the kind words. Our goal is to provide our customers with an unbeatable experience every time!

name: Prentice Jones
text: One of my best friends works at this shop so I know they are an A+ shop because Warren is a very good tech.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! We are so glad to have Warren on our team! We appreciate the great recommendation!

name: Jacob Hobbs
text: These are the kind of guys that would take their shirts off their backs to help you. Highly recommend to anyone who appreciates honest and high quality work!

resp.text: We appreciate the great review, Jacob. That is exactly who we strive to be. Thank you for your business, and we hope to see you again!

name: James Gavin
text: On a recent trip from Birmingham back to Atlanta my 2012 Hyundai Equus ran hot about 30 miles outside of Birmingham, we got off at exit 147 wound up having to get it towed back to Birmingham. I didn't know a mechanic in B'ham so I had it delivered to J.B. a Buick dealership, they inspected it for $309 and said that I at the least had a blown head gasket caused by a bad water pump and that it was going to cost me $2215  for them to break down the engine and make sure that there was no further damage with the engine,  and that it could be as much as $4500 to replace all the gaskets through out the engine. NOT TODAY!!! So I did a Google search and came across HESCO, the reviews were great, I spoke with Joe Molina and he arranged to have it tower to HESCO "DESPITE being in the middle of changing locations", they got it in checked it out, started it up, "No white smoke from the tail pipe", turned out to be the water pump, THAT's ALL. I can't recommend Joe Molina and the guys at HESCO Automotive highly enough, they are highly professional, extremely efficient, keep you informed at every juncture of the process, and very reasonable. I am telling ALL my friends and family to take their vehicles to HESCO Automotive. Thanks guys, this was a very stressful situation as I was having to take care of it from Atlanta, Joe you could not have been better.

resp.text: Thank you James! It is great to hear from you and glad we could help you out.  We want to make sure all of our costumes are taken care of and are aware of the repairs needed for their vehicle. We are glad you found us and we could located the problem to your water pump. We truly appreciate your recommendation. Give us a call if you have questions or need anything in the future!

name: Ron Denney
text: I had a bolt sheared off inside my BMW motorcycle wheel. I called Wesco from Hoover and explained the situation and that I lived 90 miles south in Dadeville, AL. I spoke with Joe on the phone. He said bring it in and they would see what they could do for me. They used an easy out to remove the bolt for me quickly and wouldn't even take any money for this service. Great people at WESCO!

resp.text: We really appreciate the excellent review, Ron. We are happy to help. Let us know if there is anything else we can help you with!

name: Ray Clark
text: I have a Z-3 and a 535i and would not let anyone else touch them in Birmingham.  I used to go to Tom Williams for items under warranty and they always found something to fix that did not need fixing.  Anything Joe, Jeff and his folks say, I trust completely.

resp.text: Ray - We cannot thank you enough for your business and the great review! We appreciate being able to work with you.

name: Dawn Brook
text: I took my wife's 07 Murano in for a few repairs and got the same great service as all the exotics Hesco works on. Great guys and service.

resp.text: Roy - Thank you for the great review! It is always a pleasure to be able to work with you and we cannot thank you enough for your business.

name: Katie munkus
text: I was very disappointed with this business. I had to have my car towed here the Wednesday before Thanksgiving. I was told that I would get a detailed estimate the following Monday. I was fine with that. When I called Monday I was told that they had already started replacing and fixing the damaged parts to my car without my permission and without my knowledge. So I specifically said please stop working on it until I get the detailed estimate I was promised and had looked it over. The next day I decided to have my car towed to a different shop that specializes in Volkswagen and Audi cars. When I called Hesco to tell them what I had decided they informed me that my car was almost completely finished. The owner made a decision without my permission yet again and without calling to inform me what was going on. I was highly disappointed that every decision made about my car was made without my input or knowledge. And that my request for them to stop the repairs was completely ignored. This business is very unprofessional and lacks the ability to communicate with their customers. I also feel that I was taken advantage of because I am a woman. Not to mention the repairs done to my car were done wrong. I ended up having to have all the transmission fluid drained and replaced bc they used a brand that is not recommended for German cars. I also had to have the tires rebalanced and aligned bc Hesco didn't properly do that either. I do not recommend this business to anyone.

name: Douglas Smith
text: Apparently Jim Burke Subaru won't work on modified Subaru's (so basically every WRX)... Hesco came through and even purchased the updated software so that they could diagnose my car. Skip Jim Burke and take your modified Subie here.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback Douglas, we are glad we were able to help when others fell short.

name: T Adams
text: These guys are truly great!

resp.text: Thank you, Rai for the 5-stars and kind words! We greatly appreciate it.

name: John Waldo
text: Don't take your Eaton supercharged vehicle here.

name: Cynthia Clement
text: After waiting for 2.5 hours the front desk couldn’t tell me when I might be seen. I love Dr Fraser but I work nights and to be in the pain I am in, I have to go somewhere that cares enough to see me in a timely manner. Also the front desk knows nothing about almost everything. They could basically get me signed in and nothing else.

name: Adam 10eighty6
text: Literally just waited 15 minutes to be hung up on. Actually heard the phone pick up and slam. 5 Star Professionalism.

name: Perry Reed
text: This seems like a very nice clinic and it is in a very good location. I am sure there are good doctors here but the one I saw didn't treat me the way I feel I should have been treated. Definitely look into them for your medical needs but like all doctors do your research.

name: carrie ivy
text: The best! The new location is very nice and the staff are as wonderful as they have always been. Even when I have had to walk in without an appointment, I did not have to wait long. My doctor and his nurses always take time to talk to me and listen to me. Highly recommended

name: Tati Bell
text: I had a great experience at Northside clinic as usual. Dr.Dixon is always very knowledgeable and Tish his nurse is very sweet and attentive. I've been a patient of theirs for several years and fully recommend to use them not only for Primary care but for emergency-like visits. Waiting time was very little and I was in and out in no time. Glad to still have real doctor offices to go to and get high quality care.

name: Lindsey Tanner
text: I moved to North Mobile and decided to establish a primary care doctor with this clinic. Upon my first wellness exam, I had some basic blood tests run. I later get a bill for those tests saying that insurance (BCBS) won't cover it. I called the insurance company and they explained that the office needs to refile with the proper "routine diagnostic" code. The doctor's office refuses to do that. BCBS even called on my behalf to see if they could explain it better and give the exact code. Nope, they won't change it. Therefore I owe $300 for medical lab work that would have been covered by my insurance company if entered correctly. I will not be returning to this medical practice. If you choose to go here, check with your insurance company to make sure everything is put in correctly & covered!

name: Anna Holmes
text: Dr. Dixon and Tish are top notch! They are thorough and precise. My wait time was minimal even after an unexpected visit. The ladies at the front desk are courteous and attentive. Will definitely recommend to all of north mobile!

name: Stacey Hall
text: Dr. West is the best.  He is very compassionate and has even called to check on us the next day.  The office ladies are very friendly!  What great service and care.

name: J Schleigh

After 2 3/4 hours, I finally got to see the doctor for a whopping 3 minutes.Their office visit cost used to be $60.00. It is now $100.00. Explaining that I no longer had insurance and couldn't afford my diabetic medication, I was given a bag full of one the medications I take and all but 2 small bottles had expired 2 months ago. I feel like ever since Northside merged with or was acquired by Mobile Infirmary that the care about the patient has fallen to the wayside to make room for more customers. I think I'll be looking for another doctor.

name: Aaron Macy
text:
These guys were in-network providers for me at the time and ordered some basic blood tests on my behalf. Despite having requested using in-network labs, I was "victim to a faulty system". They still submitted my blood to an out-of-network lab, and I was subject to the $200 bill that should have been covered with my insurance (but my insurance doesn't have a reduced, negotiated rate with out-of-network labs). Northside Clinic was no help in resolving the matter and assumed no responsibility.

I understand it is ridiculous to keep up with a large number of patients' individual insurances, but there are 2 major health insurance providers in my area. Granted I specifically requested my tests be handled in-network & that I subscribed to one of these major providers, it should not have played out like this. I was stuck w/ the $200 bill.

I had a 9:30 a.m. appointment on 9-01-17 at Northside Clinic (DMC) to see Dr. Carver and finally got up and walked out at 1:05 p.m. The only reason I tried to use them was I needed a chloresterol check for insurance purposes and the urgent care doesnt have a lab to do that.

Confused as to why they would not inform me of this or why I was allowed to check in for my appointment that apparently didn’t exist anymore the day of. Huge waste of time. text: Came in for a pre-employment screening with my registration sheet and ID, as I was told to in the LabCorp email. After 30 minutes, she then decides to call me up and take my form and ID (no idea why she couldn't have taken the time to do that when I signed in because no one else was waiting and she was literally just sitting there.  From there, it took another hour, AN HOUR, to even be called back for the screening.  It is absolutely ridiculous to have to wait that long to complete a screening that literally takes 5 minutes.  Changing jobs is hard enough without making your current employer aware by taking a 2 hour lunch break!  They need to reorganize and replace their current staff with ones that understand how hospitality works.

text: New management. Used prior to change, always fair. Went by because air quit blowing cold. Asked how much to hook up gauges to test pressure and was told "shouldn't be any charge". The compressor was engaging and disengaging so i figured it might be plugged. The technician hooked it up and saw the high side was too high and low side very low. It was plugged. They tried to say they had to pull codes and all this junk and i told them it runs fine except for the a/c. I shut off the a/c and it ran fine, it would bog down when the compressor engaged. They tried to make more out of it, then charged me $45. Avoid if possible.

resp.text: Not us!! WE have been here since 1998, no new management.

name: Kirk Ward
text: Great Service and always a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you for putting your trust in us.

name: Andrew Raymond Crawford
text: I am looking to purchase a 2002-2006 Cadillac Escalade and I used Hampton Cove Auto Services for the pre-purchase inspection of an example I was considering.  The car seemed ok to me, although I knew there were some issues with the shock absorbers and brakes.  The PPI was the best $55 I ever spent and saved me from getting mired in a long list of reliability problems and expensive repairs that would have equaled the purchase price of the car!  I haven't found the right car yet, but will try to bring a few more examples to Hampton Cove Auto Services until we identify the right one.  As well as having a diligent technical team, I have found Jaquata on the customer service side to be both accommodating and very personable.  My neighbor says she has been happily using Hampton Cove Auto Services for many years and it's very easy to see why.  I will use them again as my first preference auto mechanic.

The car drives like it's new. The difference after the 100k service and tune-up is appreciable.

text: Excellent service.

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Needed new tires on a tight schedule. They had it turned around in less then a day. They have a great a staff and great prices.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Pierce! We're glad that we could help you out with a new set of tires at great prices. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Judy Berneske
text: Good work and good price. Just not crazy about sitting in your waiting room so long - without any magazines geared for women. :-)

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Judy! We're glad that we were able to deliver quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your feedback and will work on getting new magazines. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Jared King
text: Had a great experience with the staff. Called in AM and they told me to come by around 2pm for an alignment. They were able to have my taken care of in about 25 minutes. One of two shops in town that I would go to if I had any mechanical issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Jared! Your experience means everything to us. We're glad you chose us to do your alignment and we appreciate your loyalty! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: Cathy McNeil
text: Very efficient as well as professional. Staff that knew what they were doing without taking advantage of you. Great place!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Cathy! We take pride in our staff and their ability to take care of customers and vehicles. We appreciate the five-star rating and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Kristeena Thomas
text: We started using them for our company vehicles' routine maintenance. Easy to deal with, reasonable prices, and they actually do company accounts that way we don't have to call them with a company card every time we need service. HIGHLY recommend using them!

resp.text: Thanks, Kristeena! We appreciate your business and are always happy to service your company's vehicles. We appreciate the kind words! See you next time!

name: Kyle Bandy
text: Really great experience here! Brooks was very professional and the work done was very timely! Will be a returning customer

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Kyle! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop due to our awesome team and their efficient auto work. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and we're looking forward to seeing you back for future auto services!

name: Dennis Wilson
text: Good service, competitively priced, friendly staff. I have been using Greystone Tire & Auto for several years and have always had a good experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Dennis! We're glad that we've been able to deliver consistent auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your continued support and we're looking forward to seeing you back!

name: Gabe Goodson
text: Great turn around time on the work I had done to my automobile, very professional and customer service is second to none. I will be using Greystone Tire & Auto from here on out.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Gabe! We take pride in our professional auto repairs and friendly customer service and we're glad that we could earn your trust. We appreciate your kind words and we're looking forward to having you back for future services on your vehicle!

name: Doug Phillips
text: Great family owned business always do a great job on my cars !

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Doug! We're glad that we've been able to provide consistent auto services for your vehicles and that we've been able to earn your trust. Thank you for reviewing us and we're looking forward to having you back!

text: I was in today for my first time and had a great experience.  Quick, and very professional.  Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Jeff! Your experience at our shop means everything to us. Thanks for the 5-stars!

name: Mike Scaff
text: Awesome place , clean , excellent service . friends of ours , highly recommend .

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Mike! We're glad that you had an excellent experience at our shop and we appreciate your recommendation. We're looking forward to having you back for future auto services!

name: Michelle Mauro
text: Great experience!!! Pulled up as they were closing, after a rough day, and they still plugged my tire which was well on its way to going flat! Thanks!

resp.text: Michelle, we appreciate you choosing us for your tire needs and we're glad we were able to help you despite the circumstances! Thank you for the great review and we appreciate your business!

name: Jill Wegener
text: Awesome experience. Will go back. They accept Carmax extended warranty too!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating, Jill! We're grateful for your support of Greystone Tire & Auto and we look forward to helping you out again in the future!

name: John Lee
text: Great service, as always, from Greystone Tire & Auto.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, John! We're happy to help you out with your automotive repair needs and we'll see you next time!

name: Julie Mosby
text: Had a low pressure light come on.   Called them and they told me to come on over.   They checked the tire and found a nail, plugged it and I was on my way !!   Very professional and all done in about 15 minutes !!   Highly recommended !!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us an awesome rating and review, Julie! We understand that unexpected car troubles typically happen at really inconvenient times, which is why we strive for speed as well as efficiency. See you next time!

name: William Philpott
text: Great people, great service!  Thanks for helping our four car family keep rolling!

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, William! We're glad that we could help your family with their vehicles and we appreciate your continued support! Let us know if we can assist with any other auto services!

name: Billy Brown
text: Great service. Helpful, quick and fair. Will definitely continue taking my vehicles to them.

resp.text: We really appreciate your feedback and are always happy to help our customers with whatever they need! See you next time, Billy!

name: Westley Said
text: What I found most surprising was everyone hospitality. Great people and did not try to sell me something I did not need. They are fast and accurate at what they do and this is now my go to place. Definitely a thumbs up from me!

name: damonNzelda Patrick
text: They are very professional and have great prices on your car needs. Napa auto parts is connected to the store as well which is a plus.

resp.text: We really appreciate that! Thank you for the kind words and for showing your support to our shop in Birmingham! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: tidefanz
text: Great service! They will tell you what repairs need to be done and which ones can wait. I will recommend G.A. To my friends.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and thanks for helping share the word about us! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Dave Bechtel
text: Great Job. Excellence is the norm for their work

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Dave! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to deliver excellent services. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Dominik Herrmann
text:
Great place and knowledgeable, friendly staff offering services at a reasonable price. Especially with CostCo discount. Only complaint is when I went to get my A/C checked out they only told me what I already knew. It's stuck on defrost. Repairing it would require taking the dash out. Well that's an easy 500$.
However, they did not notice the ripped vacuum-tube that connects to the driving cabin, which could be fixed from the engine compartment. Had to fix it myself after I noticed the problem. Could have done a better job on that. Otherwise great job.

name: Dylan Minor
text: Honest automotive shop that will take care of you fast and easy.

resp.text: Dylan, we're very grateful that you chose our shop in Birmingham for your automotive needs and we're glad to hear you found the service exceptional and prompt; that's our goal each time! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you!

name: Edward Zwilling
text: Recommended by AAA when my car overheated.  Honest folks.  Certainly had the opportunity to take advantage of me.  They did not.  Just added coolant and replaced a leaky hose.  Good folks.  I will use them again.

name: Sandra Cross
text: I had to have my radiator and battery replaced in my car and it was ready over the weekend. Everyone is very kind and honest here- pricing was also very competitive compared to others that I received a quote from. These are some go-to people if you have any car troubles!!

resp.text: Sandra, thanks so much for reviewing us! We appreciate your kind words and are glad to hear that we are your go-to guys for car repairs! Have a wonderful day, and we look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Sarah Kirkland
text: Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever had in my life. In short, I had to have it towed there TWICE because they never fixed the problem in the first place, my CAR WAS STOLEN because they left the keys in the car overnight, and then they jerked me around for months after and even refused to pay for getting a new key (that was stolen out of the car.) The owner seems nice, but the people at the front of the house constantly lied to me and my family. Awful, awful service.

name: Austin Howard
text: Had multiple services done on my truck including: lift install, tpms calibration, and alignment. All services done in a timely manner at very reasonable prices. Highly recommend and will be back!

name: Margaret M.
text: Tammy is always easy to work with and  the staff is all trustworthy and dependable when it comes to what maintenance my car really needs verses other chain locations that just want an extra penny.

resp.text: Margaret, thank you for the great rating and for recommending us! Integrity is so important to us and we're glad to see that your experience reflected that. See you next time!

name: Angie Trantham
text: We recently took our van to Greystone Tire and Auto and were very pleased. They did a great job and the prices were incredibly reasonable. We will be back!

resp.text: Angie, thanks so much for taking the time to leave us this review! It was our pleasure working with you and we are so glad to hear that you will be returning to us! Have a great week!

name: Ben Evans
text: Trustworthy group - family owned.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Ben! We take pride in earning the trust of our customers and we're proud to be family owned and operated. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Tory Bryant
text: I actually came to the Napa auto parts store next to auto masters for a headlight bulb and the guy wasn’t very helpful but he did suggest this place after I asked him are there any places nearby to help. It was a little after five and I wasn’t expecting them to help that night because they were so close to closing but they instantly sprang into action and fixed everything in less than 10 minutes! Super awesome helpful staff and will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Alex Tobon
text: I have used Greystone Tire and Auto multiple times. As usual the management and mechanics are always polite and helpful. They were prompt and the prices are always reasonable.  If you're looking for a great all around auto service, this is the place.

name: Joel Alakhras
text: Top Notch service and extra mile staff. I recommend the folks at Greystone Tire & Auto for your vehicles need. Very pleased!!!

resp.text: Joel, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this review! We will always go the extra mile for our customers because we could not run this business without you guys! We are looking forward to seeing you next time and appreciate your recommendations!

name: Murphy Klumpp
text: Have used these guys for years and have never once had an issue. Great people that truly care about you and making sure that your vehicle is properly taken care of. Great management and service, I highly recommend!

name: Biju Nair
text: Friendly staff and quick service. Great savings if you're a Costco membership through Costco Auto program!

name: andrew white
text: Prices are always good, they have some top notch guys working there.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Andrew! We take pride in our team and we're glad that we could deliver quality services at fair prices. Thanks again for reviewing us and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Alaa Abuafif
text: Good and fast service is of best places in Alabama

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Alaa! We appreciate you and your business. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Family owned and run business, they always get things done on time and do quality work. I also like there online appointment tool, Its a lot of help when you have a busy schedual like myself.

name: Chris DeGreen
text: Brooks and the team was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome rating and kind words, Chris! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Deanna Helton
text: So I post many reviews and honestly I hate for them to be negative but I have had a horrible experience here. I went in on Tuesday 12/18 because my car was running hot. Tammy was nice enough to give me a ride home while I waited. Firstly my car was not correctly diagnosed I spent over 500$ here and still having the same issue. When I picked it up drove toward Wal-Mart it immediately got hot so the looked at it again right before closing then i leave again same thing finally I park in publix to let it cool down. Again in the morning I take it back. Again they check it send me on my way 30 minutes later car hot again. I call and was pretty much brushed off and was told that they fixed what they thought was the problem. So as of right now I've been charged all this money car still running hot n they acting like it's cool I came in with 1 problem which has still not to be resolved. I will I'm so disappointed I travel alot for work and I'm in Alabama all alone no family I came here expecting a1 service seeing that it's connected to a napa but to spend this type of money and my issue not be fixed I'm so disappointed. Now I have to go get my car worked on all over again so I can hopefully make it home for Christmas.

name: Randy Jaudon
text: Great Place, Quick, Clean  & Friendly.  Tammy was great.  I have a new place to service my vehicle.

name: trish velez
text: BEWARE....Don’t trust these guys. We needed a headlight changed on our Prius. We were told how much. When we returned to get the car they charged us an extra $15.00 because they said in was hard! My husband asked well why didn’t you call us first to make sure it was okay. They didn’t have an answer.

name: Rene Morrison
text: This is the only place I take our vehicles to.

resp.text: We appreciate the excellent rating, Rene! Customers like you make our job easier and we're glad to help with your vehicles. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Tammey Elliott
text: Very friendly and knowledgable staff.I will not take my car anywhere else!!

name: Carolina Gillis
text: very attentive and professional. definitely will be my go to shop!

name: Johnathan Kings
text: Quick and friendly service with very fair prices!! thanks

resp.text: Johnathan, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is extremely important to us, and we are happy to hear you had a great experience. Have a happy Wednesday!

name: Wj Brown
text:
My daughter’s 07 Kia Sorento stopped on her on the freeway in Atlanta, she had it towed to a shop in Atlanta. They replaced the battery and alternator 500.00.  Two weeks later she is getting warning lights on the dashboard. Fearing that it might be more problems, when she came home for a wedding, I called Greystone Auto and took it in for a diagnostic. In less then 30 mins, results were in; defective alternator(new) . The folks at Greystone called the Atlanta shop and coordinated an under warranty replacement. That was a blessing not to have to worry about my daughter having a malfunctioning car while living there alone.
I have always gotten good service and fair prices here. I have had at least 5 repairs done there and never a complaint.
Thanks Brooke and all the folks there for easing our anxieties.! Now I have another review to write about that Atlanta shop 😡!

name: Marnie Cowan
text: We recently took a car here to get a pre-purchase inspection done, and had a great experience as they were professional, efficient and knowledge and offered a reasonable price.

name: Karen Estes
text:
Women: do not go there! Send a man!  I had trouble getting someone at the desk. I need a new light for my brakes (just one). They wanted $40.00 and I have the bulb !  No respect !!
As a woman I am used to being taken advantage of!!!!!!’

resp.text: Hello, Karen. Unfortunately we were slammed this morning so we apologize if we were not able to get to you sooner at the counter. We were not able to install this for you because you bought the part through Autozone and for legal reasons we must install our own parts in the shop. We would never discriminate or take advantage of anyone based on their gender, the reason we could not help you is simply because the part was not purchased through us. If you'd like to discuss this further, feel free to call us at the shop. Thank you.

name: Ben Pickett
text: Incredible service with great prices, these guys will really bend over backwards to make sure you're happy.

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Quick response to my needed repair.

resp.text: Thanks so much for letting us know how we did, Bruce! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is very important to us, and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience here. Have a terrific week!

name: Nelson Henderson
text: I have been in Automotive field for 35 years and this Place will become my Automotive Service Center because I felt as if they were honest and staff was very friendly. Tammy and Dustin were very Professional.

resp.text: Nelson Thanks for trusting us with your vehicle. Thanks for the review it is always great to here how our family is treating you.

name: Phil Clements
text: Fast, professional service

resp.text: We're glad you think so, Phil. That's our goal! We appreciate you sharing the word about us!

name: Jacob Kiker
text: Great place and great people

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, Jacob! We appreciate your business and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: ye li
text: Great job in fixing my car irregular noise !!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five star review, Ye!

name: Joe Earnest
text: Great service in every aspect.

name: craig martin
text: These guys are amazing! Quality work every time at unbelievable speed and low low prices! They DON'T try to break the bank. I am always speechless as to how cost effective their work is and fast. Thanks guts for ALWAYS being FAIR , FRIENDKY & FAST!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking time out of your day to leave such a kind review!

name: Miguel Davis
text: Great and quick service.

resp.text: That’s really nice to hear, thank-you!

name: Mitchell G Lattof Jr
text: I had gone to Pep Boys to get my headlight repaired. After keeping my car for 3 days trying to "diagnose" an electrical problem, Pep Boys informed me that I needed my entire headlight assembly replaced and it would take a week to get the part in and cost $2,700.00. I declined and took my car to Downtown Car Care for a 2nd opinion. After an hour or so, DCC determined that all I needed was a FUSE replaced and a new bulb. DCC saved me $2,500+ and they'll be my first "go-to" place for future repairs. They are extremely professional and friendly and I was very impressed with how clean their shop is. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Mitchell. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us

name: Alison Herlihy
text: Harold and everyone at Downtown Car Care did a great job getting my classic car up and running again! There aren't many mechanics around who can work on a 60+ year old car, let alone who will be totally honest with you about what they can do and do the work for a fair price. I'd recommend Downtown Car Care to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the great recommendation Alison! Always nice to hear from satisfied customers!

name: John Pickering
text:
Super fast, friendly team. The owner greeted me warmly, and his friendly team kept great communication. The price was downright astoundingly good for such a well-kept, professional garage in the downtown area.

I live in the downtown area and Downtown Car Care will be my garage for my maintenance needs from now on.

resp.text: John, thank you so much for the review and excellent feedback! Please come see us again anytime in the future!

name: Brittany Costello
text: Hands down the best experience I’ve ever had with a car repair shop! I got a flat tire just hours before my flight was scheduled to leave and they we’re able to fit me in and finish the job extremely fast, the day before a major holiday! The staff was a delight to work with... Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us, it was our pleasure Brittany!

name: J. Craig Dickson
text: Fast and friendly service. Extremely reasonable rates compared to dealerships and you still have ASE Certified Mechanics that can do the work you can trust! I have known Harold 2 decades and he is as good as they get in bringing resolution to a car issue or concern. I would trust my mom, my wife, my sister and any daughter to go there alone and know they would be well taken care of there! Great job Harold and Chris!!

resp.text: We're delighted to hear how much trust and confidence you have in us! Thanks for the amazing review!

name: Fatima DZ
text: Just moved in town and finally i found a honest guys that can fix my car without breaking other parts. Chris is the guy that you should talk. I will give 7 * to him.

resp.text: Thank you so much Fatima! I appreciate you taking the time to leave a review.

name: Michael Scott
text:
My girlfriend and I recently came into some critical car troubles while we were moving to New Orleans. We stopped in the nearest town which was Mobile. We took our van to Downtown Car Care and they helped us out big time. We were looking at a 1000+ service request to change and fix our transfer case. We didn't have that kind of time or money to stay there and wait for that to happen. It is a 94' so they would have had to track down the part first. Time is money. The dudes at the shop found a temporary way to get our van running safely without even changing it. Ran and still runs like a beaut. Only charged us $20 for the whole thing. Easily could have taken our asses for a ride. Solid people working at this place and would recommend them to anyone if i lived in Mobile.

Thanks for all your help.

resp.text: I’m so glad to hear you had such a positive experience! Thank you!

name: Only Hazardous (Ryan Nichols)
text: My name is Ryan, and I’ve dealt with Harold personally on MANY accounts and I have never once been dissatisfied. Super friendly guy, honest, and he’ll get the job done quick. 10 out of 10 will do business again!

resp.text: So happy to hear you have always been satisfied with our services. We really appreciate the review you have left us!

name: Unicorn Sparkle with Anne Michael
text: I had a flat tire the other day while I was downtown. The people at Downtown Car Care really took exceptional care of me! They were so friendly and welcoming when I pulled in. They knew I needed my car fixed quickly since it was almost time for carpool that afternoon.  They were quick with patching my tire, and got me back on the road in no time! I will definitely be going back to see Harold at Downtown Car Care!

resp.text: We love hearing from satisfied customers! It makes all the hard work worth it. Thank you!

name: Luke Hildreth
text: They were more then fair with price . I was in a bind and they  were amazing.

resp.text: We're glad we could help, thank you Luke. Take care!

name: john
text: I brought my wife's car in for a few things (power steering pump, alignment, and oil leak) right before we left for vacation. As we were on vacation the shop kept us updated on everything that was going on. (A part was having to be ordered from out of state) The original quote was $1,000 which I was OK with because they wanted to do a transmission flush as well. For the amount of work and parts I was happy with price. They called about half way through our week long trip to give us an update and the shop owner stated he would have it done before we got back or worst case senario, the day we got back. He also stated he thought it would be a bit cheaper, about $950, well that's great. No problem there! So the day we got home he called and said the car was finished and that he was able to do all the work for $860!!! He very well could have charged me the $1000 and I would have gladly payed. He instead did the honorable thing and charged me what it cost him! Also, very clean shop!!

resp.text: Thank you, John! We’re thrilled that you’re happy with our services.

name: Deona Elaine
text: I was on my way to New Orleans and blew a tire on the interstate on the way. Downtown car care was the closest place to me and I’m so glad I was able to get their help. As soon as I called, they sent a tow truck and the owner was able to work with me on the cost of the tire I needed. Because I had a security bolt on my wheel and didn’t have the key for it, they had to remove the bolt — and they handled it for free! Instead of replacing both tires in the back, they only replaced the one that blew after looking at the condition of the other wheel which was super helpful since I told them I was on a budget. Since I’m a female, I’ve always felt wary of mechanics, but since visiting this shop, they’ve restored my faith in the business! Thank you for your hard work, flexibility, and kindness!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review, Deona! We take great strides to make sure our clients are satisfied and appreciate when a client sees that we work hard on their behalf.

name: John Connolly
text: Fast service. Friendly staff. Really helped us out in a bind and got us back on the road again quickly. Breaking down in an unfamiliar area, states away from home, can be daunting. Everyone was exceptional.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave such a thoughtful review, John. It’s customers like you that make our job so enjoyable!

name: Cody Plaisance
text: My wife and I were traveling to Gulf Shores from Baton Rouge for a family vacation and at 3:00 both our rear breaks went out and we managed to get it to Downtown Car Care and they took it in, fixed it, and were back on the road in no time at all. This was all at an extremely reasonable price and would recommend these people to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope your vacation goes super awesome!

name: NamJung Homeschool
text:
I am YounJi from University of Alabama. My family and I had a trip to Mobile, and our car stopped working on a roadside. We looked up all the reviews and chose "Downtown Car Care" to help us.

The car broke down at 3pm on Friday. We thought there is no way to fix this car since it was late of the day. However, this place shocked me with the fastest service. They changed the broken alternator and replace to a new one in an hour. We really didn't wait at all. Plus, their customer service was great (the nicest mechanics ever seen!).

I truly recommend this place. This place saved our summer trip.
Again, choose this place for your car repair.

I also want to leave a thank-you note to the crew. Thank you for your amazing service!

resp.text: All in a day’s work, glad you’re happy with the results!

name: Tony Anthony
text: My name is Tony & I am the Service Manager at Colony One Auto Center in Stafford Tx. Our shop pride's itself in excellent customer service, after dealing with Harold Burns/ Chris over a potential catastrophe with one of our customers traveling through Mobile..........I can't be more grateful there are shops like this! These guy's were courteous, immediate and effective, its hard to get all those on the drop of a dime in an emergency situation. If anyone is travelling through Mobile (or near) or live in the area of, don't take my word for it, give these guy's a try! My thanks and gratitude for all you did Mr. Burns, Chris and the business as a whole!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! I’m so glad you were happy with everything.

name: laine casallo
text: Great place, great guys, amazing prices!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate our service Iaine!

name: Josh Gilbert
text: The only people I trust with my stuff besides myself. Friendly people and good prices too.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! I’m so glad you were happy with everything.

name: Tim Bullock
text: Great price and friendly service, was quick to repair.

resp.text: That’s really nice to hear, thank-you!

name: Nick Sierke
text: Very good service and very honest people.

resp.text: Thank-you so much, that comment just made our day!

name: Hudson Mcgallagher
text: Those guys are awsome

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate our service Hudson!

text: They are the best five star car care
